title: Apply Promotional Code
description: A new customer forgot to enter their promotional code during signup and wants to have it applied retroactively.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and the promotional code they want to use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the account and promo code details.

tasks.description: Verify that the promotional code is still valid and applicable to the customer's plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the code is valid.

tasks.description: Apply the promotion to the customer's subscription, which will take effect on the next billing cycle, and issue a credit for the first month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the discount for future bills and credits the first one.
